subpanels.description: Overview of Glinus bainesii plant in Okavango Delta, Ngamiland, Botswana, taken on 28 Nov 2004 by Roger and Alison Heath.
Overview of Glinus bainesii plant in Moremi Game Reserve, Ngamiland, Botswana, taken on 21 Nov 2007 by Roger and Alison Heath.
Flowers of Glinus bainesii plant in Okavango Delta, Ngamiland, Botswana, taken on 28 Nov 2004 by Roger and Alison Heath.
Leaves of Glinus bainesii plant in Moremi Game Reserve, Ngamiland, Botswana, taken on 21 Nov 2007 by Roger and Alison Heath.
Close-up of individual flowers of Glinus bainesii plant in Okavango Delta, Ngamiland, Botswana, taken on 28 Nov 2004 by Roger and Alison Heath.
